data.contentText:
Warmth and fluids are very important
Contact surgeons (Omar: 0999727969)

metadata.text1:
Enclose intestines in plastic to minimise fluid loss
DO NOT use warm wet saline packs
metadata.text2:
Keep on resuscitaire under heater
Put on a hat, wrap up the baby in a warm chitenje
Alternatively kangaroo position or warm incubator
metadata.text3:
20 mls per Kg bolus (normal saline)
Maintenance fluids (10% dextrose)
Monitor blood sugar
Nil by mouth
NG tube on free drainage with aspiration every 4 hours

data.title: Emergency Management
